name: Superpower Squad ECG
description: Superpower Squad is a blockchain technology-based TPS game with a superhero theme that consists of gameplays such as MOBA, RPG, Roguelike, and Social Features. Superpower Squad also includes PVP and PVE abilities. Players can create clans to combat each other and gain token rewards for successful wins. Both solo and team modes are available throughout the game, and the ease of getting started makes the game more exciting to play. Superpower Squad has a stable in-game economic system that drives its future success. The Superpower Squad community is the driving force behind the game and determines itsâ€™ successful future.
